LENZA N TONI ELI SEBE?

iSebe Lemicimbi Yendalo Nocwangciso Lophuhliso lijolise:

* ulawulo lophuhliso lwendalo kwakunye nocwangciso lophuhliso oluhlanganisiweyo,
* uphuhliso oluhlanganisiweyo lweendawo zokuhlala zoluntu, kwakunye
* nokuqinisekisa ukufikeleleka ngendlela elinganayo kwakunye nokusetyenziswa ngendlela kwezibonelelo zeli phondo.

Eli Sebe ke lijolise ikakhulu:

* Kulawulo Oluhlanganisiweyo Lwendalo Engqongileyo
* Kucwangciso Lwendalo Engqongileyo
* Kulawulo Lwendalo Eyahlukeneyo
* Kulawulo Lwamanxweme
* Kucwangciso Lwamaphondo Nolwemimandla, Kwizicwangciso-maqhinga Nakwimigaqo-nkqubo
* Kulawulo Lwezingcolisi Nenkukuma
* Ukunyanzeliswa Komthetho

IINKONZO EZINGUNDOQO

* Iimvavanyo Zefuthe Leentshukumo Zophuhliso Kwindalo
* Iinkonzo Zokunikezelwa Kwemephu
* Izicelo Zophuhliso
* Ukunikezela Ngolwazi Ngomhlaba, Izibalo Zabemi, Ezoluntu kwakunye Nezoqoqosho

IMITHETHO NEMIGAQO-NKQUBO EBALULEKILEYO

* Inkongolo Yokwahluka-hlukana Kwendalo
* umthetho iNational Environmental Management Act
* umthetho iMarine Living Resources Act
* umthetho iEnvironmental Laws Rationalisation Act
* umthetho iWestern Cape Planning and Development Act
* uMgaqo-nkqubo Wokuhlaliswa Kwabasebenzi Basezifama
* Isicwangciso Sokusetyenziswa Kwemigaqo Elawula Indalo
